00001 #ifndef ATUPLE_H
00002 #define ATUPLE_H
00003 
00004 // define a structure for holding tumor and normal counts for
00005 // Discovar contigs
00006 struct ATuple {
00007   size_t tum = 0;
00008   size_t norm= 0;
00009 
00010   // constructor from strings
00011   ATuple(string ttum, string nnorm) { 
00012     tum = static_cast<size_t>(stoi(ttum));
00013     norm = static_cast<size_t>(stoi(nnorm));
00014   }
00015 
00016   // constructor from ints
00017   ATuple(int ttum, int nnorm) { 
00018     tum = static_cast<size_t>(ttum);
00019     norm = static_cast<size_t>(nnorm);
00020   }
00021 
00022 
00023 };
00024 
00025 #endif
